Description: Generates an endpoints file (with CRUD API endpoints) given a model and optional DbContext.

Options.Name: endpoints
Options.Description: Endpoints class to use. (not file name)

Options.Name: relativeFolderPath
Options.Description: Specify the relative output folder path from project where the file needs to be generated, if not specified, file will be generated in the project folder

Options.Name: open
Options.Description: Use this option to enable OpenAPI

Options.Name: endpointsNamespace
Options.Description: Specify the name of the namespace to use for the generated Endpoints file

Options.Name: databaseProvider
Options.Description: Database provider to use. Options (without quotes) include 'sqlserver' (default), 'sqlite', 'cosmos', 'postgres'. Example: -dbProvider sqlite
